name: Cozy Critters
description:
Welcome to the Pelacozy Isles, where animals live in comfortable bliss. Here, you can explore the vibrant, and expanding lands, meeting new animals, finding foods to feed them, and cleaning up all the gloomy messes on the islands to  make them as comfortable as  possible.

Note: There are two builds.
CozyCritters_cl281_polish_final.zip contains the latest build. If this has any stability issues, use the previous build below.

CozyCritters_cl281_final.zip contains the previous version without polish in case the build above has issues running.
